label: TDWG Standards Documentation Standard
description: A standard that documents how standards should be described in human- and machine-readable terms.

label: Vocabulary Maintenance Standard
description: A standard that describes the processes used to modify TDWG vocabularies and their associated documents.

label: Audubon Core Multimedia Resources Metadata Schema
description: The Audubon Core is a set of vocabularies designed to represent metadata for biodiversity multimedia resources and collections.

label: GUID and Life Sciences Identifiers Applicability Statements
description: This standard provides guidance on how to use GUIDs to meet specific requirements of the biodiversity information community.

label: Darwin Core
description: This vocabulary standard includes a glossary of terms intended to facilitate the sharing of information about biological diversity by providing identifiers, labels, and definitions.

label: TDWG Access Protocol for Information Retrieval (TAPIR)
description: TAPIR is a computer protocol designed for discovery, search and retrieval of distributed data over the Internet.

label: Herbarium Information Standards and Protocols for Interchange of Data (HISPID3)
World Geographical Scheme for Recording Plant Distributions
XDF - A Language for the Definition and Exchange of Biological Data Sets
Index Herbariorum. Part I: The Herbaria of the World
International Transfer Format for Botanic Garden Plant Records
Taxonomic Literature, Edition 2 and its Supplements
